LanguageData.Ammo_CGear_GrdFrag.label: TC Frag Ammo Grenade Mortar
LanguageData.Ammo_CGear_GrdFrag.description: A specialised magazine loaded with TC frag grenades for use in the TC Grenade Mortar. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Proj_CGear_MortarGrenadeFrag.label: TC Frag grenade
